field.name: description
field.value: The HtmlHelper.Link(string,string) method, as stated in the documentation, should work like this: $HtmlHelper.Link( "mypage.html", "This is a link to my page" ) => This is a link to my page This is not working, as the method is internally calling the LinkTo(string name, string action) method, which has totally different expected parameter meanings. A patch will be provided which fixes this issue by having the Link(string,string) method internally call the Link(string,string,null) method, which provides the correct functionality.
